regen.absent_element: provision of feedback for correct answers
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide feedback to the user when a correct answer is selected.
The system shall inform the user when a question is answered correctly before proceeding to the next question.
The system shall acknowledge and record correct answers and proceed to the next question.

label: If the user selects the correct answer, a message to this effect will be displayed and the component will move to the next question.
absence: situation of selecting the correct answer
